frontmatter.title: Communicating the positive aspects of technology
frontmatter.description: It wasn't long ago that tech was overly revered. It's now overly criticized. Tech brings change, good and bad. Find good technology that enables others.

frontmatter.title: Harness technology for positive effects
frontmatter.description: New technology poses problems and creates opportunities. Find the ways to harness the best and filter out the bad.

frontmatter.title: Make the most of available communication tools
frontmatter.description: Use the tools available to communicate with the most important people.

frontmatter.title: Use technology to connect personally
frontmatter.description: Don't let physical distance be the barrier. Use technology to connect personally.

frontmatter.title: Use the appropriate tool
frontmatter.description: Not every job requires the same tools. Take time to consider the purpose first.

frontmatter.title: Harness technology to increase effective efforts
frontmatter.description: Technology should be considered as a tool. Tools can make processes easier and change the entire process.

frontmatter.title: Technology improves life incrementally and leads to step changes
frontmatter.description: Technology improves life incrementally and leads to step changes

frontmatter.title: Help others discover right questions to ask
frontmatter.description: Help others discover right the questions to ask rather than assuming prior knowledge - or implying best next steps.
